nodes.text: The Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk's favorite cantina was located on the Jurzan spaceport. By 3 ABY, the cantina had been destroyed during an explosive firefight on the spaceport between Bossk and the smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca.
Bossk's favorite cantina was mentioned in "Tooth and Claw", a short story written by Michael Kogge and published in the From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back anthology in 2020.
